message.body: Hey Dov, would Jacob be interested in playing a jazz gig at Bees Knees tomorrow night at 7?
Jacob says.. "Sweet" he'll be there or we'll be there @ 6:00 upright piano there will suffice?
Cool..will pass the word along..real book etc..if you care to you could send/email jahleafoflife@gmail.com a potential set Kat so he could peruse some charts this eve or ma√±ana..B'Shalom
